critique: The document is a formal executive order regarding the appointment of postmasters. It primarily focuses on legal and procedural aspects. There is no strong indication of any particular emotion being conveyed. Therefore, the initial scores are set to 1 across all emotions, indicating a neutral emotional tone. After further consideration, the formal and legal nature of the document suggests a slightly higher emphasis on conveying a sense of order and perhaps a mild sense of importance or seriousness. However, this is still very subtle and doesn't warrant a significant change in the scores.
